text: Denny Scott Miller (born Dennis Linn Miller; April 25, 1934 - September 9, 2014) was an American actor. He was best best known for his role as Tarzan in the movie Tarzan, the Ape Man (1959). He also appeared in many television series such as Wagon Train, Gilligan's Island, Magnum, P.I., The Brady Bunch and Gunsmoke. Miller was born in Bloomington, Indiana. He was married to Kit Smythe until their divorce. He was later married to Nancy Miller until his death. Miller died from Lou Gehrig's disease on September 9, 2014 in Las Vegas, Nevada. He was 80. He was also diagnosed with the disease in January 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Indiana Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Nevada Category:People from Bloomington, Indiana
title: Denny Miller
